actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish a Citizens Commission on Economic Regulatory Oversight to study Federal economic regulation and recommend the elimination of unnecessary regulatory agencies and laws, and for other purposes.
short_title: Citizens Commission on Economic Regulatory Oversight Act

summary.text: Citizens Commission on Economic Regulatory Oversight Act - Establishes the Citizens Commission on Economic Regulatory Oversight to: (1) study and evaluate the functioning of the independent economic regulatory agencies; (2) study and evaluate economic regulation generally; and (3) present administrative and legislative recommendations to Congress. Requires the Commission to submit to the President and to Congress a final report of its findings and recommendations not later than 18 months after the appointment of its members. Disbands the Commission 60 days after such final report is submitted.

titles.title: Citizens Commission on Economic Regulatory Oversight Act

A bill to establish a Citizens Commission on Economic Regulatory Oversight to study Federal economic regulation and recommend the elimination of unnecessary regulatory agencies and laws, and for other purposes.
